resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103073</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103073</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202517</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The ABC's of the Three Little Pigs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die ABC der drei kleinen Schweine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les ABC des trois petits porcs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os ABC dos três porcos pequenos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I ABC dei tre maiali piccoli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα ABC των τριών μικρών χοίρων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los ABC de los tres pequeños cerdos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson uses a familiar fairy tale to teach writing. It is designed to emphasize using varied sentence patterns in writing.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion verwendet eine vertraute fairy 
Geschichte, um Schreiben zu unterrichten. Sie ist konzipiert, um
mit mannigfaltigen Programmsatzmustern im Schreiben hervorzuheben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon emploie un conte de fées familier 
pour enseigner l'écriture. Elle est conçue pour souligner en 
utilisant les configurations diverses de phrase dans l'écriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição usa um tale fairy familiar ensinar a 
escrita. É projetada emfatizar usando testes padrões variados 
da sentença na escrita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione usa un racconto fairy esperto per 
insegnare la scrittura. È destinata per dare risalto a usando i
modelli vari di frase nella scrittura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα χρησιμοποιεί μια γνωστή ιστορία 
νεράιδων για να διδάξει το γράψιμο. Έχει ως σκοπό να 
υπογραμμίσει τη χρησιμοποίηση των ποικίλων προτύπων πρότασης 
γράφοντας εγγράφως.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección utiliza un cuento de hadas familiar 
para enseñar la escritura. Se diseña para acentuar con modelos
variados de la sentencia en la escritura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:PENNY CANIPE
FN:PENNY CANIPE
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202517</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103073</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-abcs-of-the-three-little-pigs</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
